description: Try our easy to follow Prawn Pad Thai recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Prawn Pad Thai Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place noodles into a large heatproof bowl. Cover with boiling water and soak for 5 minutes or until soft. Drain.
Whisk stock and sauces together in a small jug.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add prawns and stir-fry for 3 minutes or until completely changed in colour. Transfer to a bowl.

Add vegetables to wok with 1 tbs water. Cover and cook for 2 minutes. Transfer to bowl with prawns. Add noodles and sauce mixture to wok. Toss well for 2 minutes. Pour over egg and stir-fry for 1 minute or until egg coats noodles and is scrambled in texture.
Return prawns and vegetables to wok. Stir-fry 2 minutes to reheat. Divide evenly between 4 bowls, top with peanuts and serve.
